#summary Developer Requirements

= Introduction =

List of requirements if you wish to contribute to this project.


= Details =

  * Visual Studio 2005/8 (project is in 2005 format)
  * DevExpress License for WinForms (v7.3 or greater)
  * VistaDB License for v2 & v3

Note: The DevExpress & [http://www.vistadb.net/ VistaDB] files required for development are not provided as this would be in conflict with their licensing agreements. You must have a valid license to contribute to this project.
